settings.title: Masks
settings.description:
[Facial Masks for Instantly Brighter Skin]

Want to transform your complexion instantly? Use an at-home anti-aging mask. The benefits include instantly brighter skin, improved tone and texture, and a firmer, tighter-looking jawline. In addition, you can improve skin tone and firmness with the proper use of clay-based masks regularly.

To clarify, look for a mask with glycolic acids, such as our Professional Strength Pumpkin Mask, which uses 5% Glycolic Acid to refine your skin's texture and tone. Use it at least once a week for a healthier appearance and to maintain results.

At Skin Perfection, we offer masks for anti-aging, firming, nourishing, clarifying, and even sensitive skin. Find your perfect facial mask today!

[Types of Face Masks]

Clay- Best for firming and tightening the jawline. They are also great for drawing out impurities from blemish-prone skin. Your skin type will determine the type of clay, kaolin for normal to oily, and bentonite for mature, dry skin.Honey- is extraordinarily moisturizing and beneficial for skin balancing.Gels- Hydrating gels offer nourishing and essential vitamins for a healthy complexion.Enzyme- The gentlest, perfect for those with sensitive skin.

Directions: Scoop a dollop of the product and apply it to the face and neck. Leave on for up to 15 minutes, then rinse and pat dry. Repeat one to three times a week or as needed.
